page.title: 17HIGHLAND DANCING
page.content: Most of the girls in our school go to{Highland Dancing.}There is one in Muirtown School and one in the Spectrum Centre. For the Highland Dancing you have to wear shorts and T-shirt. It costs 70p or 80p. You only wear shorts if you are going to practice. If we are performing or taking exams, we wear kilts. We get medals if we do well in the exam. I have six medals. Every year we have to dance at the parks for the tourists. Quite a lot of people come to watch us do dances like the{Sword Dance}and{ {Highland Fling.}Sometimes there are some galas and you have to dance in a field.
